definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Both the free hydroxyl groups readily undergo esterification .
sentences.chinese: 兩個自由羥基，都容易酯化。

sentences.english: The kinetics of esterification of linalool with acetic anhydride was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了芳樟醇與乙酸酐酯化反應動力學。

sentences.english: The esterification of acetic acid with n-butanol by dealuminated USY zeolite was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了脫鋁超穩Y沸石催化乙酸與正丁醇的酯化反應。

sentences.english: Liquid rosin resin is made from the gum rosin through esterification with polylol.
sentences.chinese: 液體松香脂由松香與多元醇酯化而成。

sentences.english: The gas phase heat carrier system used in esterification process was modified.
sentences.chinese: 對酯化用氣相熱載體系統進行了改造。

sentences.english: In this paper, a set of experimental device of esterification.
sentences.chinese: 對酯化反應器的擴大增容設計具有十分重要的意義。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the sulfation -conditions of Bletilla striata polysaccharide (BSPS).
sentences.chinese: 目的優選白芨多糖硫酸酯化的最佳工藝。

sentences.english: The kinetics of esterification is discussed and kinetic equation set up.
sentences.chinese: 探討了酯化的動力學，並建立了動力學方程。

sentences.english: The microwave heating technology was applied to produce phosphate monoester starch.
sentences.chinese: 微波酯化技術用於澱粉變性反應制備磷酸單酯澱粉。

sentences.english: The preparation of dimethyl malonate was studied with monochloroacetic acid, methanol and sodium cyanide by …
sentences.chinese: 對氰化酯化法合成丙二酸二甲酯的工藝進行了改進。

sentences.english: Stannic Chloride can be used as catalyst for esterification instead of sulphuric acid.
sentences.chinese: 四氯化錫能代替硫酸作爲酯化催化劑。

sentences.english: The microwave etherifying technology was applied to produce phosphate monoester starch(SMEP).
sentences.chinese: 微波酯化技術用於澱粉變性反應制備磷酸單酯澱粉。

sentences.english: It is made by the reaction of sugar with a mixed anhydride as esterifying agent.
sentences.chinese: 它是由混合的脂肪酸酐作爲酯化劑與蔗糖反應制得。

sentences.english: Sodium bisulfate can be used as catalyst for the esterification instead of sulfuric acid.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸氫鈉能夠代替硫酸作爲酯化催化劑。

sentences.english: The esterification mechanism of unsaturated carboxylic acid was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了不飽和羧酸酯化反應的機理。

sentences.english: The homogeneous reactions, esterification or hydrolysis, are catalyzed by the acetic acid.
sentences.chinese: 酯化或水解反應等均相反應都在醋酸催化下進行。
